players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and pay close attention to each other's actions and words."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie's sentiment. Let's all keep a close eye on each other to ensure the safety of our town."
You: "I will remain silent as I know my actions are crucial for the mafioso's victory. However, I suggest we all stay alert and be cautious of each other's movements and conversations."
Charlie: "I believe we should all focus on building trust and cooperation within our town. Let's try to work together and share any suspicious observations or concerns we may have."
Diana: "I'd like to propose that we all share any information or suspicions we may have, in order to maintain the safety and trust within our town. Let us work together and communicate openly."
